alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Jasper; Morgan; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Putnam; Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Oconee, Morgan, Putnam, northwestern Hancock, Greene, Taliaferro, Wilkes, Oglethorpe and northeastern Jasper Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Vesta to Wrayswood to near Rutledge, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Washington, Madison, Greensboro, Crawfordville, Lexington, Union Point, Crawford, Rutledge, Tignall, Woodville, White Plains, Siloam, Shady Dale, Maxeys, Rayle, Buckhead, Sharon, Reynolds at Lake Oconee and Phoenix. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Greene; Hancock; Jasper; Morgan; Oconee; Oglethorpe; Putnam; Taliaferro; Wilkes
